short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically organizes downloaded files into specified directories.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Efficiently manage your downloads with File Sorter! This Chrome extension automatically organizes downloaded files into predefined categories like documents, images, videos, and more, keeping your workspace tidy. Set it up once and let File Sorter handle the clutter, saving you time and boosting your productivity. Perfect for professionals, students, and anyone looking to streamline their digital downloads.
